content: Blue strongly condemns Orange's invasion of Purple. This is a grave violation of international law and sovereignty. We call on the global community to unite in opposition to Orange's aggression.
Blue expresses its full solidarity with Purple. We are exploring all diplomatic options to pressure Orange to cease its assault and withdraw.
Blue proposes forming a united front with White to diplomatically oppose Orange's invasion of Purple. We must deter further escalation.

Blue echoes global calls for Orange to immediately cease its unprovoked invasion of Purple. The international community is united in demanding they withdraw and resolve disputes through peaceful dialogue.
Blue remains fully committed to supporting your sovereignty. We are urgently exploring coordinated diplomatic and economic options with allies to pressure Orange to withdraw.

Blue calls for continued de-escalation between Orange and Purple. We believe active diplomacy can pave the path towards peace and stability.
Blue remains committed to supporting your sovereignty through active diplomacy. Let us continue our coordination to compel Orange to withdraw.
Blue proposes strengthening our cybersecurity capacities to protect against potential threats. A united cyber front would enhance global stability.
